full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 146 of 247 274 LBUVMAX4 Visoski - cross 1 Q. And you also talked to her about scheduling maintenance visits for the planes, right? 2 A. That's correct. 3 Q. And you talked to her about scheduling your own vacations, right? 4 A. Yes 5 Q. So generally speaking, these were the main interactions you had with Ghislaine regarding employment issues and your job? 6 A. Yes, that was a good description of a lot of the interaction that I had with Ms. Maxwell; correct. 7 Q. But now when Ghislaine had time when she wasn't working, she spent time on other pursuits, right? 8 A. Yes. 9 Q. She became a trained emergency medical technician, didn't she? 10 A. I know she had some medical training, yes. 11 Q. EMT? 12 A. EMT, yes. 13 Q. And she also became a trained helicopter pilot, too? 14 A. Yes, she did. 15 Q. You, yourself, are a trained helicopter pilot, right? 16 A. Yes, I am. 17 Q. And you traveled with Ghislaine when she went to school to become a trained helicopter pilot, right? 18 A. Yes, we traveled frequently together. 19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011918
